metadata.name: OYA VIP #1/10
metadata.description:
VIP Key

Your own private resort within a resort. Four cabins for your friends and family that are based on the four classical elements of Earth, Wind, Water, and Fire. 

VIP NFT Utilities

-3 guest passes per year  
- Lifetime access to all locations now and in the future  
-Can reserve an entire location for your own private retreat  
- Access to Family Membership  
- Access to personal Transformation Guide  
- Complete OYA Method Health Scan & Lifestyle analysis  
- VIP Island Gala - holder only Gala event  
- Travel Drops in exclusive locations  
- The OYA Private experience - access to our exclusive private mansion locations in The  
Hamptons, NY and SOHO,NY.  
- Access to NFTree  
- Priority access to pop up location and OYA Health pop ups  
- Networking events - access to members only events of OYA and other collaborating  
communities  
- Access to OYA Beach Club - surf & learn center in Cabarete Beach, Dominican Republic  
- OYA Box with Power ups  
- Exclusive offer on EZ Rider tours  
- OYA AirDrops  
- Discounted rate on selected wellness products
